title: what does preseason ranked do
body: just wondering what preseason has to do, how does it affect the game next season?

replies.body: if you climb or fall a very long way (like 3-4 divisions) it will have a slight impact on your placement games next season. Other than that, almost nothing.

allows you to increase/decrease your mmr. Helps make next season's placements more consistent and also helps you maintain your current mmr, since each season it gets dropped by a few hundred, but playing ranked in preseason helps you recover the mmr you lost.
